job.title: Software Sr Engineer - BI Developer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtThis position plays a critical role in driving business transformation through technical innovation and will support business intelligence work within Wells Fargos Wells Fargo CRM Customer Relationship Management system We are seeking a Software Sr Engineer that has extensive experience in Power BI along with experience in moving from OnPremise to Cloud and setting up net new Projects in the Cloud Position will also have a strong Agile background to align with that Go Forward model The key skills are specific to the Power BI and Power Platform Go Forward ModelltbrgtltbrgtThe individual will work closely with product owners technical teams architects and senior managers to ensure timely delivery of critical projects As a senior resource this individual will also provide guidance and leadership to more junior developers and staff and is expected to be a leader within the agile delivery teams they are aligned toltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt7 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligt5 years of Agile experienceltligtltligt3 years of technical engagement experience with multiple stakeholdersltligtltligt5 years of business intelligence experienceltligtltligt5 years of data analysis experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligtExposure to Wells Fargo CRM Customer Relationship Management systemltligtltligtExperience leading projects that require integration of multiple technology systems to deliver new online functionality and user experienceltligtltligt5 years of net experienceltligtltligt5 years of MS SQL server experienceltligtltligtKnowledge and understanding of relational database concepts querying data warehousing ETL process requirements gathering andor decision support toolsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob ExpectationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtAbility to work nights weekends andor holidays as needed or scheduledltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtStreet AddressltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtMNMinneapolis ltstronggt600 S 4th St  Minneapolis MNltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtNCCharlotte ltstronggt300 S Brevard St  Charlotte NCltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDisclaimerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActltbrgtltbrgtRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenltbrgtltbrgtWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity
